EmailContent.subject: {CompanyName} Reconciliation Questions - {TodaysDate}
EmailContent.body:
Hi,

In order to streamline our communication, we send out this recurring email with a link to our CFO App. Here is the link: Click here

This week we have [{NotInBankUnreconciledItemsCount} of unreconciled Not in Books lines with comments] questions for unreconciled bank transactions.

Much thanks,
ProvenCFO
